description.narrative: Business Partners Limited (BP) has successfully and sustainably focused on the provision of risk finance/capital, technical assistance, mentorship, and business premises for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) in South Africa for more than 34 years. It now wishes to establish Business Partners International East Africa (BPI EA) as an investment company with permanent capital and an infinite life in order to position itself as a viable and sustainable SME risk capital provider in Kenya, Rwanda and Uganda. BPI EA will continue to use the model that was successfully applied in South Africa, and more recently in Kenya and Rwanda.

participating-org.narrative: Business Partners International East Africa LLC.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Netherlands
